actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 37, United States Code, to refine the procedures for adjustments in military compensation and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides that the President will establish pay rates for the military. Establishes a subsistence allowance equal to the cost of the ration. Provides for allowance for quarters for those entitled to basic pay. Requires the President to adjust military pay upward each time pay for Federal employees is raised.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 37, United States Code, to refine the procedures for adjustments in military compensation and for other purposes.
